query: Crooked Gravel gravel race Winter Park

videos.title: 🏔 Crooked Gravel 2025 – Winter Park, Colorado | GoPro Race Highlights
videos.description:
Ride along with me in the Crooked Gravel 2025 race through the beautiful high country of Winter Park, Colorado. This 67 mile course took us over miles of rugged gravel roads, forest trails, and big mountain climbs — all surrounded by stunning Rocky Mountain scenery.

Shot on my GoPro for a rider’s-eye view of the action — from the dusty pace lines to the thrilling descents and quiet stretches deep in the forest. Gravel racing combines endurance, skill, and adventure, and Winter Park delivered it all.

📍 Event: Crooked Gravel 2025
🚴 Location: Winter Park, Colorado
🎥 Camera: GoPro HERO10

If you enjoy cycling, adventure, or just beautiful mountain scenery, hit Like and Subscribe for more ride-along videos from races and epic rides across Colorado.

videos.title: Gravel Ride - Winter Park, CO - Crooked Gravel Short Course
videos.description: Family vacation gave me the opportunity to try out the course used during the Crooked Gravel Event

videos.title: 2022 Crooked Gravel 67 mile
videos.description: A few minutes of on-bike footage from the 2022 Crooked Gravel in Winter Park, Colorado. No audio commentary, but it will give you a good idea what the course is like. All footage shot on a GoPro Hero10 Black.

videos.title: Crooked Gravel 2020
videos.description: Gravel biking in Grand County, Colorado near Winter Park Ski result. We did a loop starting in Fraser, CO along the Crooked Creek that brought us within 3 miles of the summit of Ute Pass. We returned via county road 50 out of Hot Sulfur Springs.
